title: Her Imperfect Groom
description: Despite his three engagements, the thrice-jilted baronet, Sir Wallace Benedict, has trouble when it comes to those of the fairer sex. Twenty years old and still unmarried, Edwina Banks, has taken it into her mind to see that Sir Wallace get his much-deserved and long awaited happily-ever-after. Because truly then, she can find hers, too... Or can she?
author: Rose Gordon
